title: Rioters, come join a easy Q/A? (:
body:
http://37.media.tumblr.com/b4ad6f85c2cad17f3a7d0eaed0b59588/tumblr_miq7h5mwlX1raf3v8o1_500.gif

Anyone else can join too. It's a simple question and I'll add why I'm asking.

What did you major and what is a day at your job like? 

[Reason for asking: I am a current college student who is struggling on deciding what I want to major in. I've done my research on specific majors but they don't really answer what I'm specifically wanting to know. So by asking someone who has experience, it will help me give an idea and possible solution to my struggle.]
